aboutUsSec.title: About Project
aboutUsSec.paragraph: EWS Type of Houses located at the heart of the Navi Mumbai and equipped with amenities like Solar Panels, Rainwater Harvesting, different Species of trees, Football Field, Cricket Ground, Basketball Court, Multipurpose Ground, Garden for Seniors, Parking, Fitness Club, Commercial Shops, Bus Terminus and Railway Forecourt

viewHomesSec.title: View Homes in 3D
viewHomesSec.paragraph: Capture your glimpse at the CIDCO house with 3D virtual tour. View how it will look in real space by clicking on the button below.
